business_description: India's full-stack financial solutions company, providing payment gateway services, corporate banking solutions (RazorpayX), and lending (Razorpay Capital) to businesses.
target_audience: All types of Indian businesses, including e-commerce, D2C brands, startups, and SMEs, who need to accept online payments, manage payroll, or access working capital.

faq_and_pricing.answer: Razorpay provides a full-stack platform for businesses to accept, process, and disburse digital payments. Our main products are the Payment Gateway and RazorpayX (Business Banking).
We have a standard pricing model with **no setup or annual maintenance fees.** We only charge a transaction fee when you get paid.
The standard platform fee for most domestic transactions (Cards, UPI, Netbanking, Wallets) is **1.75% per transaction** (plus applicable GST).
